entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
